name: Gigahurts
description:
In Gigahurts you are the computer. Juggle tons of programs that are all competing for the same resources. Better keep those programs running or they will crash. Crash too many programs and its Game Over!

-Take a walk through computing history as you play Story Mode.
-See how long you can last against a never ending wave of programs in Endless Mode.
-Build your own computer system and play it in Custom Mode
-Upgrade your parts so that you can rank higher on the Global Leaderboards.
